MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have arrived onsite to begin fault location and are bringing generators to site. We now expect your supply to be restored by 3:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05pm on the 23rd of March 2021.
